languages.text:
"...Славно взломать оборону врага беспощадным ударом,
Но славно вдвойне расколоть его смелость строфой беспощадной!"

"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"
languages.original_text:
"...Славно взломать оборону врага беспощадным ударом,
Но славно вдвойне расколоть его смелость строфой беспощадной!"

by verse unrelenting!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
“——击穿敌人的防御，
给予敌人致命一击，
是何等的荣耀之举。
但若是乘胜追击，
以无情的诗句摧枯拉朽
则是双倍的荣耀！”
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
“——击穿敌人的防御，
给予敌人致命一击，
是何等的荣耀之举。
但若是乘胜追击，
以无情的诗句摧枯拉朽
则是双倍的荣耀！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
「何と素晴らしき栄冠か
敵の守りを
粉砕する無情な一撃、
だが栄光が二重となるのは
その勇気を砕きしとき
勢い衰えぬ詩によって！」
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
「何と素晴らしき栄冠か
敵の守りを
粉砕する無情な一撃、
だが栄光が二重となるのは
その勇気を砕きしとき
勢い衰えぬ詩によって！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
«... Cuánta gloria cabe en abatir
las defensas de un enemigo
con un golpe inmisericorde.
¡Mas mayor es la gloria que recibe
quien abate ademanes
con versos implacables!».
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
«... Cuánta gloria cabe en abatir
las defensas de un enemigo
con un golpe inmisericorde.
¡Mas mayor es la gloria que recibe
quien abate ademanes
con versos implacables!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
« Qu'il est glorieux d'anéantir
les défenses de son ennemi
par des coups sans pitié,
mais plus grande encore est la gloire
de celui qui sape le courage
par des vers implacables ! »
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
« Qu'il est glorieux d'anéantir
les défenses de son ennemi
par des coups sans pitié,
mais plus grande encore est la gloire
de celui qui sape le courage
par des vers implacables ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Ruhmreich ist's, zu erschüttern
eines Feinds Verteidigung
durch gnadenlosen Streich.
Gar verdoppelt wird der Ruhm,
wird er mutig noch erhöht
durch rücksichtslosen Vers!"
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
"Ruhmreich ist's, zu erschüttern
eines Feinds Verteidigung
durch gnadenlosen Streich.
Gar verdoppelt wird der Ruhm,
wird er mutig noch erhöht
durch rücksichtslosen Vers!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Düşmanın savunmasını
Amansız bir vuruşla
Dağıtmak şanlıdır.
İki katıyla gelir şan,
Amansız mısraları
Cesaret kıranlara!"
languages.original_text:
"—How glorious to shatter
a foe's defences
by blow unpitying,
But glory is doubly granted
to he who courage shatters
by verse unrelenting!"

traits.locale_text:
"Düşmanın savunmasını
amansız bir vuruşla
parçalamak ne şanlıdır.
Fakat şan gelir iki katıyla,
amansız mısralarıyla
cesaret kıranlara!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
